result.execSummary:
Quentin M Smith was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Quentin M Smith was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Quentin M Smith

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Quentin M Smith not in court, in custody.  Attorney Theodore OReilly in court for Quentin M Smith.  Attorney Erika Strebel in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a Status Conference.
Defendant has been turned over to the State of Indiana  on 9-23-2022
On motion of the state, Court ordered case closed.

HELD OFF THE RECORD
Defendant Quentin M Smith not in court.  Attorney Theodore OReilly in court for Quentin M Smith.  Attorney Erika Strebel in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Status Conference.
Defense inform the court that the defendant is hospitalize and can not be transported to the state of Indiana at this time. Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Entry dated 9-8-2022 currently reflects:  Court found the Defendant is the person wanted in the State of  ILLINOIS.
Correct Entry should Reflect:
Defense advises the court there are no identifying grounds for a Habeas Challenges and request a status date to ensure defendant has been picked up by Indiana. Court found the Defendant is the person wanted in the State of INDIANA. Defendant waived extradition.

Defendant Quentin M Smith in court, in custody.  
Attorney Theodore OReilly in court for Quentin M Smith.  
Attorney Erika Strebel in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a Status Conference. Partris in receipt of the Governor's Warrant. 
Court reviewed Criminal Complaint and found probable cause. Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus. 
Court found the Defendant is the person wanted in the State of  ILLINOIS. Defendant WAIVED Extradition  
Court ordered the Defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.
Status conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on September 8, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Court is in receipt of a email dated 8-19-2022 stating they have received the Governor's Warrant and requesting an earlier date.
Parties confirms the new date via email. Status Conference scheduled September 8, 2022 at 8:30am.

Attorney Theodore OReilly in court, defendant Quentin M Smith not in court, in custody.  Alexandria S. Carlson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a status conference. Defendant in custody, not produced. Governer's warant not yet issued for defendant to be extradited to Indiana. Court orders defendant to be continued to be remanded in Milwaukee County Sheriff custody. Case adjourned to Branch 45.
  Pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-04, parties are hereby notified that as of July 30, 2022, this case will be assigned to Branch 19, Judge Kori Ashley, in Room 313 of the Safety Building.  Status conference scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
CRIMINAL WARRANT FOR COMMITMENT; signed and filed.

CORRECTION: to entry made on 6-25-22.  Defendant did NOT waive extraditon.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kies, Branch 45.
Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Indiana
Defendant contested extradition.  Court ordered Defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.
Case remains scheduled for a status conference on 7-25-22 at 8:30 am.

Defendant Quentin M Smith in court with attorney Theodore OReilly.  Defendant Quentin M Smith in custody.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kies, Branch 45.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Indiana.  Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  Court ordered the defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Status conference scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
